executable.title: EMSegment Command-line
executable.description: EMSegment command-line module description and help.
executable.acknowledgements: Many people and organizations have contributed to the funding, design, and development of the EMSegment algorithm and its various implementations.

file.name: mrmlSceneFileName
file.description: Active MRML scene that contains EMSegment algorithm parameters.
file.label: MRML Scene

string.name: parametersMRMLNodeName
string.description: The name of the EMSegment parameters node within the active MRML scene.
string.label: Parameters Node Name

file.name: resultVolumeFileName
file.description: The name of the segmentation result volume. This flag should be used if the output volume is not currently defined by a MRML node (if it is, use resultMRMLNodeName instead).
file.label: Result Volume Filename

string-vector.name: targetVolumeFileNames
string-vector.description: Names of target volumes (to be segmented). This flag should be used if the volumes are not present in the MRML scene (if they are, use targetMRMLNodeNames instead). The number of target images must be less than or equal to the number of target images specified in the parameter set, and these images must be spatially aligned.
string-vector.label: Target FileNames

file.name: resultMRMLSceneFileName
file.description: Write a MRML file that contains the target images and output labelmap.
file.label: Result MRML Scene File Name
